text: Stan Black (November 12, 1955 – August 24, 2018) was an American football defensive back. He played for the San Francisco 49ers in 1977. He died after being hit by a car on August 24, 2018, in Madison, Mississippi at age 62. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American football defensive backs Category:Mississippi State Bulldogs football players Category:San Francisco 49ers players
title: Stan Black
